item.title: The Big Red 100g
item.description: Rich, red and full-bodied, The Big Red (da hong pao) is the ideal tea if you like a bit of bite to your brew. It's grown in the Wuyi Mountains of Fujian, and is an Oolong tea with a natural smokey taste and hints of cinnamon. It's great first thing in the morning, and is one of our most popular teas.
item.g:google_product_category: Food, Beverages & Tobacco > Beverages > Tea & Infusions

item.title: Jasmine Pearls 100g
item.description: Stunningly fragrant Jasmine scented green tea, this tea is hand-made by rolling fresh green tea leaves together with natural jasmine flowers. The sweet jasmine flavour infuses the tea leaves with a taste guaranteed to wow you and your guests. If you're giving tea as a gift, this is a sure-fire winner.
item.g:google_product_category: Food, Beverages & Tobacco > Beverages > Tea & Infusions

item.title: Iron Buddha 100g
item.description: Light, refreshing and low in caffeine, Iron Buddha (tie guan yin) is the perfect start to your healthy lifestyle. It's a classic pure and green Chinese Oolong tea, grown in the high mountains of Anxi County in Fujian and has a special xiang suan taste, which refreshes the palette and tingles the tastebuds. It's also great as an appetiser or with snacks.
item.g:google_product_category: Food, Beverages & Tobacco > Beverages > Tea & Infusions

item.title: Old Iron 100g
item.description: A charcoal-roasted dark Oolong tea, the affectionately named Old Iron (lao tie) falls halfway between a green and red Oolong. The flavour carries the clarity and pure taste of a green Oolong, but with the more subtle deep roasted tones of a red. Often ignored even in China, nevertheless this tea is one of our favourite brews to date and a great everyday drink.
item.g:google_product_category: Food, Beverages & Tobacco > Beverages > Tea & Infusions

item.title: Lapsang souchong 100g
item.description: The world-famous pinewood-smoked red tea, Lapsang Souchong (zheng shan xiao zhong) is a 'love-it-or-hate-it' tea. Produced in the Wuyi Mountains of Fujian, we're sure you'll love it for it's laid-back smokey taste and soothing aroma that's just perfect for those lazy Sunday mornings.
item.g:google_product_category: Food, Beverages & Tobacco > Beverages > Tea & Infusions

item.title: Jin Jun Mei 100g
item.description: A naturally sweet and fruity red tea, Jin Jun Mei (sometimes called Golden Eyebrow) is the perfect tea for the sweet-tooths out there. Grown in the Wuyi Mountains of Fujian, it has a plummy and well rounded taste and naturally sweet edge. It's quickly become one of China's most popular teas in recent years, and with good reason.
item.g:google_product_category: Food, Beverages & Tobacco > Beverages > Tea & Infusions

item.title: Silver Needle 100g
item.description: Made from only tender young tea-shoots, Silver Needle (yin zhen) tea has a fresh taste as close as you'll get to plucking the tea-leaves yourself. The taste is lighter and more vegetal than other green teas, and because of the strict use of only young shoots and careful wilting under the sun, demand is always high.
item.g:google_product_category: Food, Beverages & Tobacco > Beverages > Tea & Infusions

item.title: Thumble Cup
item.description: Taste your tea the traditional way using these miniature glass sipping cups. They hold a perfect three sips of tea, just enough to appreciate the flavour of your loose-leaf teas, and their double-walled construction is stylish, keeps your tea hot, and also stops your fingers getting scalded by the hot water.
item.g:google_product_category: Home & Garden > Kitchen & Dining > Tableware > Drinkware > Tea Cups & Saucers

item.title: Glass teapot
item.description: Brew your tea to perfection using this glass infuser teapot. It's solid glass design and built-in infuser are perfect for beautiful and fast brewing of the perfect cuppa. Simply place your loose-leaf tea in the removable glass infuser basket, and add hot water, and then watch your tea expand and unfurl, infusing your brew with their delicate taste. Holds approx. 600ml.
item.g:google_product_category: Home & Garden > Kitchen & Dining > Tableware > Coffee & Tea Pots

item.title: Glass Storage Pot
item.description: Store your teas in style - these glass and cork storage pots are perfect for keeping your tea fresh as the day they were picked. Teas can degrade quickly if you don't store them properly, so these storage pots make the perfect companion for your teas. A cork lid seals in the fresh taste, and it's easy to see when you're running low through the clear glass walls.
item.g:google_product_category: Home & Garden > Kitchen & Dining > Tableware > Drinkware > Tea Cups & Saucers

item.title: Double Walled Tea Mug
item.description: This huge glass tea mug holds an entire pot of tea so it's great at your desk or if you really enjoy your tea in buckets. Plus, the double-walled glass construction means you can appreciate the colour and hue of your fresh loose-leaf tea while it stays warm (and your hands don't get scalded by the boiling water!). Holds approx. 600ml
item.g:google_product_category: Home & Garden > Kitchen & Dining > Tableware > Drinkware > Tea Cups & Saucers

item.title: Wide-base teacup
item.description: This beautiful and practical glass tea cup sits perfectly on your desk or table, and is an elegant companion for your Chinese teas. It has an attractive and modern wide-base design, so it's great for serving tea in style whether on your desk at work or with friends. We use this cup every day as it holds just the right amount, and lets you appreciate the pure colour of your freshly brewed tea. Holds approx. 200ml.
item.g:google_product_category: Home & Garden > Kitchen & Dining > Tableware > Drinkware > Tea Cups & Saucers

item.title: Beginners Pack
item.description: Three superb teas to start your journey into Chinese tea. This simple beginners pack contains three of our most popular Chinese teas: Iron Buddha, Jasmine Pearls, and The Big Red. Each tea represents a unique flavour and variety of Chinese tea and as well as being a great gift, is the ideal way to explore your favourite tastes.
item.g:google_product_category: Food, Beverages & Tobacco > Beverages > Tea & Infusions

item.title: Fine Tea Taster
item.description: Sample three of the most sought-after teas in China - Iron Buddha, Jin Jun Mei and Silver Needle, all grown and produced in Fujian, China. Each of these teas is the pinnacle of its genre, offering distinct tastes ranging from clean and pure white tea, rich and smooth Oolong, to punchy and naturally sweet black tea.
item.g:google_product_category: Food, Beverages & Tobacco > Beverages > Tea & Infusions

item.title: Green Tea Taster
item.description: Three superb, lightly processed and natural green teas, offering a range of natural green tea tastes you wouldn't believe possible. It's a shame that when most of us think of green tea, we think of tasteless teabags - this selection is here to reverse that trend.
item.g:google_product_category: Food, Beverages & Tobacco > Beverages > Tea & Infusions

item.title: Oolong Tea Taster
item.description: Taste the full range of Oolong tea, from green to red, and enjoy the subtle differences in flavour through each stage of oolong processing. Together these three teas show the breadth and depth of Oolong teas, from a lightly oxidised Iron Buddha, a medium-charcoal-roasted Old Iron, and a deep-roasted red Big Red tea.
item.g:google_product_category: Food, Beverages & Tobacco > Beverages > Tea & Infusions

item.title: Red Tea Taster
item.description: Three teas, three unique tastes, all from one region. Grown within a few kilometres, each offers subtly different layers of natural fruit, charcoal and pinewood tastes. The Wuyi Mountains are the famous home of Fujian teas, but even small differences in how the tea is picked and processed can produce vast variations in taste.
item.g:google_product_category: Food, Beverages & Tobacco > Beverages > Tea & Infusions

item.title: Roasted Tea Taster
item.description: Explore the different tastes of roasted Chinese teas. Yes, tea is roasted! But different methods produce unique tastes, even when the tea comes from the same plant. This sample pack contains two black teas from the Wuyi Mountain area both roasted over different woods, and a charcoal roasted Oolong tea from Anxi County.
item.g:google_product_category: Food, Beverages & Tobacco > Beverages > Tea & Infusions

item.title: Red Jasmine 100g
item.description: Red Jasmine is a tea taste revolution - the deep, earthy tones of red tea combined with a sweet Jasmine fragrance. Traditionally, only green tea leaves couuld hold the delicate Jasmine flower fragrance - until now. Red Jasmine Tea is made using a recently discovered method, and is one of the 'holy grails' of tea-tasting. We're proud to be the first UK company to sell this incredible tea, and it's our new favourite brew!
item.g:google_product_category: Food, Beverages & Tobacco > Beverages > Tea & Infusions
